snippet.title: Cairn - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Get a deep dive into the gameplay of Cairn in this new trailer for the upcoming survival climbing simulation game from the creators of Furi and Haven. In Cairn, reach a summit never climbed before. Climb anywhere and plan your route carefully, managing pitons and resources to survive unforgiving Mount Kami. Discover what Aava is willing to sacrifice to achieve the ascent of a lifetime. Cairn will be available on PC.

#IGN #Gaming
